titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling for the resignation of General Noriega as the commander-in-chief of the Panamanian Defense Forces, a position from which he has functioned as the de facto ruler of Panama.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Expresses concern over recent events in Panama and the deterioration of U.S.-Panamanian relations. Reaffirms the Congress' commitment to the full implementation of the terms of the Panama Canal Treaties. Calls for General Noriega to resign as commander-in-chief of the Panamanian Defense Forces to facilitate a return to democracy and normalization of U.S.-Panamanian relations.
